metadata.title: CVE-2022-3565 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in LinuxKernel. Affected by this issue is the function del_timer of the filedrivers/isdn/mISDN/l1oip_core.c of the component Bluetooth. Themanipulation leads to use after free. It is recommended to apply a patch tofix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211088.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3565` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-200-generic - 4.15.0-200.211
linux-image-4.15.0-200-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-200.211
linux-image-4.15.0-200-lowlatency - 4.15.0-200.211
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-200-generic - 4.15.0-200.211
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-200-lowlatency - 4.15.0-200.211
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-135-generic - 5.4.0-135.152~18.04.2

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-200.211').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
